name: Another Wikipedia Style
description:
• applies to wikipedia.org , wiktionary.org, and wikibooks.org
  • underline links
  • legible typeface (-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Lucida Grande", "Lucida Sans Unicode", "Verdana", "Trebuchet MS", "Tahoma", "Georgia")
  • reduce measure
  • increase line height
  • reduce contrast
  • remove navigation
